title: Align response storage format with HTTPx raw HTTP format
description: probeHTTP's response storage diverges from HTTPx in 6 areas: directory layout (extra response/ subdir), no index.txt, hash includes method prefix, custom === SECTION === format instead of raw HTTP, redirect chain is summarized instead of full req/resp pairs, and final URL is in a section instead of bare last line. All 6 must match HTTPx so downstream tools consume either tool's output interchangeably.

title: Add storage unit tests
description: Tests for: GenerateFilename (SHA1 URL only), BuildStoragePath (no response/ subdir), FormatStoredResponse (raw HTTP format single+multi hop), AppendToIndex (format and concurrency), StoreResponse (correct path).

title: Add ChainEntry type and rewrite FormatStoredResponse to raw HTTP format
description: Replace custom === SECTION === format with raw HTTP request/response pairs per hop. Add ChainEntry struct to carry per-hop data (RawRequest, RawResponse, Body). Output: request headers, blank line, response headers, blank line, body, separator between hops, final URL on last line.

title: Capture full redirect chain as ChainEntry slices
description: Modify followRedirects() and followRedirectsWithClient() to return []storage.ChainEntry. At each hop, capture formatRawRequest, formatRawResponse, and body. Always read body when StoreResponse enabled (not just debug mode).

title: Wire chain entries into storage calls in prober
description: In probeURLHTTP and probeURLWithConfig: save initialBody before redirect overwrite, build fullChain from initial + redirect entries, call FormatStoredResponse with new signature, call AppendToIndex after storage.

title: Update hash and path: SHA1(URL) and remove response/ subdir
description: GenerateFilename: drop method param, hash URL only. BuildStoragePath: remove response/ segment. StoreResponse: drop method param. main.go: remove response/ subdir initialization.

title: Add index.txt generation with concurrent safety
description: Add AppendToIndex() with sync.Mutex protection. Format: {relative_path} {url} ({statusCode} {statusText}). Called after each successful StoreResponse.
